page.title: 20Whittington Village Shops
page.content: The Three Trees shop in Station Road is a general store selling a variety of groceries,fruit and vegetables cleaning materials,sweets and cigarettes.On the A5 near the zebra crossing is a newsagent and sweet shop which is also the local post office.The principal post office business is the payment of pensions and benefits and the sale of stamps.A first class stamp for a letter is 17p and a second class stamp 13p.Stamps are also sold in books for 50p and Â£1.70.82% of first class mail is delivered the following day and 98% of second class mail in two days.There are postage stamps on sale in 27 values from 1p upwards.Other shops include a small general store near the Penybryn estate,a butcher's and two antique shops.
